transcript: I don't get it. First time it came here to see it, you said it was the best night of your life. And last year I remember distinctly you were so excited to get here, you stubbed your toe rushing me out the door and didn't even notice until we were in the car.

segments.text: First time it came here to see it, you said it was the best night of your life.
And last year I remember distinctly you were so excited to get here, you stubbed your toe
rushing me out the door and didn't even notice until we were in the car.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't get it.  First time we came here to see it, you said it was the best night of your life.  And last year, I remember distinctly you were so excited to get here, you stubbed your toe rushing me out the door and didn't even notice until we were in the car.
